text: The Paul Daniels Magic Show was a British magic show that aired on BBC1 from 9 June 1979 present. The show was presented by entertainer and magician Paul Daniels and his assistant Debbie McGee whom he married in 1988. == References == Category:1970s British television series debuts Category:1980s British television series Category:1990s British television series Category:BBC Television programmes Category:1977 television series debuts
title: The Paul Daniels Magic Show
